keywords:
Experience in luxury retail or high-end customer service environments
- Knowledge of CRM systems (Salesforce experience is a plus)
- Bilingual abilities (Spanish or Mandarin preferred)
- Previous experience with mobile POS systems
- Understanding of fashion and luxury brand aesthetics
- Certification in customer service excellence or similar programs

Skills Required:
- Customer service expertise
- Sales technique proficiency
- Conflict resolution abilities
- Active listening
- Cash handling experience
- Product knowledge retention
- Attention to detail
- Team collaboration
- Problem-solving mindset
- Adaptability to retail environment

Compensation & Benefits:
- Competitive base salary: $28
